# fly Provider





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `fly_api_token` (String) fly.io api token. If not set checks env for FLY_API_TOKEN
- `fly_http_endpoint` (String) Where the provider should look to find the fly http endpoint
